name: Kalvin
content:
Kalvin was a Human male child who was affiliated with the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. He was skilled at dodging, conning others, starship piloting, swimming, droid programming and repair, and use of blasters and technology. Standing 1.3 meters tall, Kalvin wore shoes, pants, a belt, a shirt and jacket, and a hat. He also carried a blaster rifle, syntherope, a tool kit, a medpac, and pouches.
Kalvin was created for the Rebel Characters Adventure Set, a boxed set of metal miniatures released in 1989 by West End Games to be used with Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. Kalvin's character type was listed as "Kid" and his model came unpainted.
